about_the_game:
Can you survive in this mystical world that conquered by Zombies? Pick your hero, upgrade your abilities, crush your enemies and zombies!

With ongoing game modes Undead is waiting for you!

  • Deathmatch Game Mode;
  • Players stands against zombies and other players. They try to survive with their pick of equipments and hero.
    Game mode's length is 5 minutes. Players who stay alive until the timer is over rewarded with extra experience. Players gets 1 points for each kill of zombie or player and get their names written in the leaderboard! WHO WILL BE THE KING OF THE LEADERBOARD!

  • Nexus Game Mode;
  • Players start the game with 2 seperate teams and they have to protect their source of energy from enemy team and ZOMBIES!

  • Fly or die - Team Deathmatch Game Mode;
  • Player start the game with 2 seperate teams. Players try to survive against tough map concept without touching the ground and fighting with others. Game Mode's duration is 5 minutes.


Upcoming Game Modes;


  • Battle Royale Game Mode ;
  • Players try to survive with some of their picked equipments or with the equipments that they will loot from mysterious boxes all over the map! Only the one/s who survive till the end gets reward. WILL YOU BE THAT BRAVE TO STAY ALIVE TILL THE END?

  • Payload Game Mode ;
  • Players start the game with 2 seperate teams and they try to push the vehicle filled with load to their enemy base!
    If you push payload within the time your team will be victorious. If no one can push the payload to enemy base within the time , team that stay close to the payload will lose the game!
